full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Supply of Cohesity Subscription License and Maintenance Services

**Tender Reference Number**: SSC-23-00024852:T
**Tender Solicitation Number**: BPM020332/24852
**Publication Date**: 14 December 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: 12 January 2024 at 14:00 (EST)
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Procurement Method**: Competitive
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (SRVTGD)

**Description of Goods and Services**: The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking proposals for the supply of Cohesity subscription license and maintenance services. Amendment 3 extends the closing date to 12 January 2024.

**Scope of Requirements**: The scope of the requirements includes the provision of Cohesity subscription license and maintenance services for SSC.

**Critical Dates**:
- **Publication Date**: 14 December 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: 12 January 2024 at 14:00 (EST)

**Countries Eligible to Respond**: Canada
**Regions Eligible to Respond**: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region [NCR])

**Regions of Delivery**: Ontario
**Period of Performance**: The start and end dates are yet to be determined.

**Trade Agreements**: This solicitation is open to bids from suppliers who are eligible under the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**:
- Name: Eleanor Cesare
- Phone: 613 219-8366
- Fax: 613 960-6026
- Email: None
- Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2H8, Canada

**Documents**: The solicitation documents are available at the following URL:
- https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/8297D122-F576-4225-A731-307D8E30920C
- https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/4C7BFD5D-8B7E-4BFA-B700-8B6876BC0566

The rewritten text maintains all the crucial details of the original text. I have corrected grammatical errors,
